summary: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.
cast: Walter Pidgeon|Anne Francis|Leslie Nielsen|Warren Stevens|Jack Kelly|Richard Anderson|Earl Holliman|George Wallace|Robert Dix|Jimmy Thompson|James Drury|Harry Harvey Jr.|Roger McGee|Peter Miller|Morgan Jones|Richard Grant|Robby the Robot|James Best|William Boyett|Frankie Darro|Marvin Miller|Les Tremayne
director: Director: Fred M. Wilcox (as Fred McLeod Wilcox)
title: Planeta prohibido
